attributes.action: Save the 84 bus route in Hertfordshire
attributes.additional_details: The 84 metroline bus route is a life line for many people such as elderly who need it to get to the shops or people who work late and need it to get home as it can get too dark to walk.
attributes.background: The 84 metroline bus route is a life line for many people such as elderly who need it to get to the shops or people who work late and need it to get home as it can get too dark to walk.

rejection.details:
Petitions must call for a specific action that the UK Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about local bus routes are a matter for individual transport operators and the relevant local authority, not the Government or Parliament.

As a result it is not possible for the Government or Parliament to take the action you have requested.

You could raise this issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
